name: SLOPE-PEST (Downloadable) MizJam1
description:
SLOPE-PEST by khaim0919
Art by www.kenney.nl
Made fore Miz Game Jam 1

WASD Controls with a sound track soon to come (August 24/25th!)

Not Required Win Stages for People Who Like Winning: 
Easy: Over 8000 score!
Medium: Over 13000 score! 5 Flags
Hard: Over 20000 score! 30 Flags
Harder: Over 100000 score! 100 Flags

Loading shouldn't take to long so just be patient with it. 

This is my first ever Jam and I'm really glad I got this out in time!
